sentences.sentence: There is a local carnival every year.
sentences.translation: 当地每年都举行狂欢节。

sentences.sentence: The carnival parade was a magnificent spectacle.
sentences.translation: 狂欢节游行场面热烈，蔚为大观。

sentences.sentence: It is one moment when artists are judged instead of all being lumped together in a merry carnival.
sentences.translation: 这是一个艺术家被评判，而不是所有人聚集狂欢的时刻。
